page.title: 03NICOLA'S TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and have my breakfast of cereal.I leave the house at 8.30 and walk to school. School starts at 9.00.We start the morning with hymns and prayers in the hall and the rest of the morning is taken up with maths,and English.We have play at 10.40 and finish for dinner at 12.00. After dinner we start school at 1.30. We do Geography or History ,Games and Art.Very often we use the video and television to see different programmes Playtime is at 3.00 and we go home at 4.00. I sometimes stay at school to take part in Athletics or gymnnastics.When I go home I have a cooked meal and then I go out to call for my friend Lisa or go and play in the park.I go to bed at 9.15.
